SustainabilityPurchase.name: SustainabilityPurchase
SustainabilityPurchase.description: Represents information related to the sustainability credits purchases such as carbon credits.

BillingAddress.description: The billing address associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingCity.description: The billing city associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingCountry.description: The billing country associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingGeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy level of the geocode for the billing address.

BillingLatitude.description: The billing address latitude associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingLongitude.description: The billing address longitude associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingPostalCode.description: The billing address postal code associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingState.description: The billing state associated with the sustainability purchase.

BillingStreet.description: The billing street associated with the sustainability purchase.

BrokerId.description: The name of the organization responsible for facilitating the supply of carbon credits.

Description.description: The description of the sustainability purchase.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the data that is imported for the carbon credit project.

InvoiceNumber.description: The invoice number associated with the sustainability purchase.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the sustainability purchase record.

OwnerId.description: The primary user associated with the sustainability purchase.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number associated with the sustainability purchase.

Type.description: The type of the sustainability purchase.
